pacman::p_load(tidyverse, gganimate)

```{r}
timesteps = 500
w0 = 0
sd = 1

w = array(NA,timesteps+1)
w[1] = 0
for(i in 1:timesteps){
  w[i+1] = w[i]+rnorm(1,0,sd)
}

data.frame(x = 1:timesteps,
           y = w[1:timesteps]) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y))+
  xlab("Time")+
  ylab("x")+
  geom_line()+
  theme_classic()+
  transition_time(x)


```
